title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode in build 20020416, the entire client area is redrawn N times.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be a maximum of one redraw for each visible line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Launch the application in build 20020416.
2. Enable word wrap mode for the StyledText.
3. Append N lines to the StyledText.
4. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times, instead of a maximum of one redraw per visible line.
